parameter.name: associatedMenuAction
parameter.shortdesc: The menu action that implements the  menu item.

parameter.name: at
parameter.shortdesc: The location of the menu item relative to the reference object or within the containing object. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the at parameter specifies before or after. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new MenuItem &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the MenuItem.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the MenuItem with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the MenuItem with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the MenuItem with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the MenuItems within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The MenuItem, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: MenuItem, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The MenuItem, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: MenuItem, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first MenuItem in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last MenuItem in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle MenuItem in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the MenuItem with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the MenuItem that follows the desired MenuItem.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the MenuItem whose index follows the specified MenuItem in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The MenuItem whose index comes before the desired MenuItem.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any MenuItem in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every MenuItem in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the MenuItem.
Returns the MenuItem with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
